org.hak5.ducky

Interface Command

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Alt, Break, CapsLock, Control, DefaultDelay, Delay, Delete, DownArrow, End, Enter, Escape, Home, Insert, LeftArrow, Menu, Mute, NumLock, PageDown, PageUp, Play, PrintScreen, RightArrow, ScrollLock, Shift, Space, Stop, String, SystemPower, SystemSleep, SystemWake, Tab, UpArrow, VolumeDown, VolumeUp, Windows

    public interface Command
    Represents the basic functionality that each valid command should implement. This guarantees that each command provides a way to execute itself and retrieve its name, alias (if any), and related information on the command to be displayed along with the --help switch.
    Author:
    Kevin Polulak

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void action(State state, java.lang.String args)
      Code to run when command name is found in file.
      java.lang.String getAltName()
      Alternative shorthand name (for example, DEFAULTDELAY, DOWN, GUI).
      java.lang.String getHelp()
      Related command info for use with --help switch.
      java.lang.String getName()
      Command name (for example, DEFAULT_DELAY, DOWNARROW, WINDOWS).
